verses.verse: Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> let us fear <S%G5399><s%> lest, <S%G3379><s%> while a promise <S%G1860><s%> remains <S%G2641><s%> of entering <S%G1525><s%> His rest, <S%G2663><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of you should seem <S%G1380><s%> to have come <S%G5302><s%> short <S%G5302><s%> of it.

For indeed <S%G2532><s%> we have had good <S%G2097><s%> news <S%G2097><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> to us, just <S%G2509><s%> as they also; <S%G2548><s%> but the word <S%G3056><s%> they heard <S%G189><s%> did not profit <S%G5623><s%> them, because it was not united <S%G4786><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> in those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> heard. <S%G191><s%>

For we who <S%G5101><s%> have believed <S%G4100><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> that rest, <S%G2663><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as He has said, <S%G3004><s%> "As I swore <S%G3660><s%> in My wrath, <S%G3709><s%> They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> My rest, <S%G2663><s%>" although <S%G2543><s%> His works <S%G2041><s%> were finished <S%G1096><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

For He has thus <S%G3779><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> somewhere <S%G4225><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> [day <S%G2250><s%>], "And God <S%G2316><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> on the seventh <S%G1442><s%> day from all <S%G3956><s%> His works <S%G2041><s%>";
and again <S%G3825><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> [passage], "They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> My rest. <S%G2663><s%>"

Since <S%G1893><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it remains <S%G620><s%> for some <S%G5100><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> it, and those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> formerly <S%G4387><s%> had good <S%G2097><s%> news <S%G2097><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> to them failed <S%G3756><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of disobedience, <S%G543><s%>

He again <S%G3825><s%> fixes <S%G3724><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> "Today, <S%G4594><s%>" saying <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> long <S%G5118><s%> a time <S%G5550><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as has been said <S%G4275><s%> before, <S%G4275><s%> "Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> His voice, <S%G5456><s%> Do not harden <S%G4645><s%> your hearts. <S%G2588><s%>"
For if <S%G1437><s%> Joshua <S%G2424><s%> had given <S%G2664><s%> them rest, <S%G2664><s%> He would not have spoken <S%G2980><s%> of another <S%G243><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that.
There remains <S%G620><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> a Sabbath <S%G4520><s%> rest <S%G4520><s%> for the people <S%G2992><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For the one who <S%G5101><s%> has entered <S%G1525><s%> His rest <S%G2663><s%> has himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> from his works, <S%G2041><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> did from His.

Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> be diligent <S%G4704><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> that rest, <S%G2663><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> [following] the same <S%G846><s%> example <S%G5262><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>

For the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is living <S%G2198><s%> and active <S%G1756><s%> and sharper <S%G5114><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> two-edged sword, <S%G3162><s%> and piercing <S%G1338><s%> as far <S%G891><s%> as the division <S%G3311><s%> of soul <S%G5590><s%> and spirit, <S%G4151><s%> of both <S%G5037><s%> joints <S%G719><s%> and marrow, <S%G3452><s%> and able <S%G2924><s%> to judge <S%G2924><s%> the thoughts <S%G1761><s%> and intentions <S%G1771><s%> of the heart. <S%G2588><s%>

And there is no <S%G3756><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> hidden <S%G852><s%> from His sight, <S%G1799><s%> but all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are open <S%G1131><s%> and laid <S%G5136><s%> bare <S%G5136><s%> to the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of Him with whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G3056><s%> to do. <S%G3056><s%>

Since then <S%G3767><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> the heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> let us hold <S%G2902><s%> fast <S%G2902><s%> our confession. <S%G3671><s%>

For we do not have <S%G2192><s%> a high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3361><s%> sympathize <S%G4834><s%> with our weaknesses, <S%G769><s%> but One who <S%G5101><s%> has been tempted <S%G3985><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> as [we are, yet] without <S%G5565><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> draw <S%G4334><s%> near <S%G4334><s%> with confidence <S%G3954><s%> to the throne <S%G2362><s%> of grace, <S%G5485><s%> that we may receive <S%G2983><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> and may find <S%G2147><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to help <S%G996><s%> in time <S%G2121><s%> of need. <S%G2121><s%>
